# Zensical Migration Acceptance Criteria Template

Use this template to define objective acceptance gates before migration closure.

## Acceptance criteria

| Criterion | Measure | Target | Evidence | Status |
|---|---|---|---|---|
| Documentation build health | Build success rate | 100% on latest run |  | pass/fail |
| Link integrity | Broken links | 0 broken links |  | pass/fail |
| Navigation parity | Required sections present | 100% mapped |  | pass/fail |
| Verification completion | Required checklists completed | 100% complete |  | pass/fail |
| Rollback readiness | Rollback plan validated | Confirmed |  | pass/fail |

## Exit decision

- [ ] Acceptance criteria met
- [ ] Follow-up needed before closure
